name: Sweet Potato Casserole Dessert
author: Mary48
summary: Fluffy sweet potatoes mixed with butter, sugar, and vanilla, and baked with a crunchy pecan streusel topping. This recipe was  given to me by my brother-in-law.
ingredients: 4 ½ cups cooked and mashed sweet potatoes
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, mix together mashed sweet potatoes, 1/2 cup butter, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, and eggs
Spread sweet potato mixture into the prepared baking dish
In a small bowl, mix together brown sugar and flour
Cut in 1/3 cup butter until mixture is crumbly, then stir in pecans
Sprinkle pecan mixture over the sweet potatoes
Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown
